definitions.definition: Connection or association; the condition of being related.
The links between the x-values and y-values of ordered pairs of numbers especially coordinates.
Kinship; being related by blood or marriage.

definitions.example: They have been in a relationship for ten years, but have never married.

definitions.definition: A way in which two or more people behave and are involved with each other
definitions.example: I have a good working relationship with my boss.

definitions.definition: The level or degree of affinity between keys, chords and tones.
